get.description: Returns all permissions with optional search, pagination, and sorting.

get.summary: Get a single permission by slug
get.description: Returns a single permission by slug.

put.description: Updates the permission identified by the given slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: slug of the permission to update

delete.description: Deletes a permission identified by slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: slug of the permission to be deleted

message.example: An error occurred while deleting the permission

get.description: Returns all roles with optional search, pagination, and sorting.

get.summary: Get a single role by slug
get.description: Returns a single role by slug.

put.description: Updates the role identified by the given slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: slug of the role to update

delete.description: Deletes a role identified by slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: slug of the role to be deleted

message.example: An error occurred while deleting the role

post.description: Attach permissions identified by the given slug.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the Role to attach permissions

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action should be either attach or detach

permissions.description: Array of permission slugs to attach to the role

post.description: Invalidates the user's JWT token to log them out.

401.description: Unauthorized if token is invalid or not provided

500.description: Internal Server Error if there's a problem logging the user out

get.description: Returns all users with optional search, pagination, and sorting.

get.summary: Get a single user by username
get.description: Returns a single user by username.

delete.description: Deletes a user identified by username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user to be deleted

message.example: An error occurred while deleting the user

put.description: Updates the user identified by the given ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

post.summary: Attach or Detach permissions to a user

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user to assign permissions

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action should be either attach or detach
